original_text: And Jesus called a little child unto him, and set him in the midst of them,
korean_text: 예수께서 한 어린 아이를 불러 그들 가운데 세우시고

sentences.original_text: And Jesus called a little child unto him
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님께서 어린 아이 하나를 자기에게 불러

sentences.original_text: and set him in the midst of them
